DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to make a standardized and scalable Rasch-built clinical severity scale to help in finding genetic and environmental modifiers of disease in Facioscapulohumeral muscular dystrophy (FSHD).
DOC.brief_title: Rasch-analysis of Clinical Severity in FSHD
DOC.criteria: Genetic confirmation of FSHD (either FSHD1 or FSHD2) Do not understand English Unable to provide informed consent
